data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 114,410 people in the state of Krapinsko-Zagorska who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Krapinsko-Zagorska, Croatia

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Krapinsko-Zagorska, Croatia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Krapinsko-Zagorska, Croatia.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Krapinsko-Zagorska.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Bosniak people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Krapinsko-Zagorska, Croatia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Krapinsko-Zagorska. Through your servants plant 24 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the state of Krapinsko-Zagorska, Croatia has a population of 124,500.

We estimate Krapinsko-Zagorska has 525 people who might know Jesus, 114,410 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,565 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 237 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Krapinsko-Zagorska, Croatia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
